Name: Enforce
Description: Deal 2 damage. Deal 4 damage instead if it is dealt to a subdued enemy.

Name: Throw in the Slammer
Description: Deal 2 damage. If it is dealt to an enemy, also subdue it.

Name: Interrogate
Description:
Subdue an enemy.
Draw a card.

Name: Clear Out
Description: Discard any number of actions from your field. Deal X+2 damage divided as you choose among any number of enemies, where X is the number of resources discarded this way.
